WorkItem.Description: The alignments of the inner ContentPresenter of Content control is set to Top and Left instead of Stretch.  This is causing the views that are injected into the regions to be distorted.
WorkItem.Summary: [Regions] ContentControl's inner ContentPresenter has wrong Horizontal and Vertical alignment set
